_header: The grace of Jesu full of might
_description: ‘XV Signa ante Iudicium’ — 180 lines in quatrains

BLHar913.First Lines:
Þe grace of ihesu fulle of miȝteþroȜ prier of
                    ure swete leuedi…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…þe xii dai þe fure elemens sul cri al in one heiȝ
                    steuenemerci ihesu fiz mari as þou ert god and king of
                    heuene
